title: Multiple Recent Event Banner Fonts
content:
I am designing a T-Shirt for this event and need to know what all of the fonts are in this banner. Sorry about the image size. Thanks in advance for the assistance.

Frank Williams

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Zozo_3543.png)
author: frankwil

comments.content:
"the 90th..." is Little Lord Fontleroy NF or Fontleroy Brown NF (hard to tell because the sample is so small)...  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/fontleroy-nf-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160330/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/fontleroy-nf-pro/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/fontleroy-nf-pro/")

ZOZOBRA is Seaside Resort NF..  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/seasideresortnf](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160330/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/seasideresortnf "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/seasideresortnf")

the dates, I do not know...
Outstanding oldnick! Looks correct for both alpha fonts. Thanks much for your expertise. Anyone else who might know what the numeric font is?
Thank you DPape. That's it. What a great site.
